entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
